sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.EAIBZWKDSTCD AS "EAIBZWKDSTCD", A.BZWKDSTICNAME AS "BZWKDSTICNAME", (CASE WHEN B.EAIBZWKDSTCD IS NULL THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END) AS "CHK" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT EAIBZWKDSTCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIMN04 WHERE USERID = #userId# ) B ON A.EAIBZWKDSTCD = B.EAIBZWKDSTCD WHERE A.EAIBZWKDSTCD in (select EAIBZWKDSTCD from $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 where USERID =#loginId#) ORDER BY A.EAIBZWKDSTCD ASC

SELECT A.EAIBZWKDSTCD AS "EAIBZWKDSTCD", A.BZWKDSTICNAME AS "BZWKDSTICNAME", CASE WHEN B.EAIBZWKDSTCD IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS "USEYN" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 A, ( SELECT EAIBZWKDSTCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIMN04 WHERE USERID = #userId# ) B WHERE A.EAIBZWKDSTCD = B.EAIBZWKDSTCD ORDER BY B.EAIBZWKDSTCD ASC
